title: Did Dehan Carroll commend President Trump, commend the Democrats for not criticizing him?
subtitle: The right-wing web sites and Facebook pages shared the old Mimi, which was quoted by the veteran Broadway and Hollywood representative.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Between January 2017 and March 2018, Dehan Carroll publicly commended and defended President Donald Trump and appealed to the Democrats to end their criticism of him.
